sutools module

su (Super User) tools

Per module utilities, designed to be lightweight, easy to configure, and reduce boilerplate code.

sutools.cli(desc=None, logs=False)[source]

init cli and register to store

sutools.log()[source]

retrieve loggers namespace from store

sutools.logger(name='sphinx-bu', loggers=None, loglvl=20, filename='2023-02-20_23-25-01', filepath=None, filefmt=<logging.Formatter object>, fhandler=None, filecap=None, filetimeout=None, file=True, streamfmt=<logging.Formatter object>, shandler=<StreamHandler <stderr> (NOTSET)>, stream=False)[source]

init logger object and register to store

sutools.register(func)[source]
